what-it-does:
Checks for @pytest.mark.usefixtures() decorators that aren't passed any
arguments.
why-is-this-bad:
A @pytest.mark.usefixtures() decorator that isn't passed any arguments is
useless and should be removed.
example:
import pytest


@pytest.mark.usefixtures()
def test_something(): ...



Use instead:


def test_something(): ...
